version_description:
- 3000s new plants added. Now PictureThis can identify more plants all over the world.
- Higher accuracy. With all the efforts we made, our AI based engine is now smarter and more accurate.
- Identification optimization. It is convenient for users to suggest a name for an unknown plant.
- New selection function. We have classified identified and unknown plants lists.
- New history browsing feature. Users can review browsing history in the setting page.

- 3000s new plants added. Now PictureThis can identify more plants all over the world.
- Higher accuracy. With all the efforts we made, our AI based engine is now smarter and more accurate.
- Identification optimization. It is convenient for users to suggest a name for an unknown plant.
- New selection function. We have classified identified and unknown plants lists.
- New history browsing feature. Users can review browsing history in the setting page.

- 3000s new plants added. Now PictureThis can identify more plants all over the world.
- Higher accuracy. With all the efforts we made, our AI based engine is now smarter and more accurate.
- Identification optimization. It is convenient for users to suggest a name for an unknown plant.
- New selection function. We have classified identified and unknown plants lists.
- New history browsing feature. Users can review browsing history in the setting page.

- 3000s new plants added. Now PictureThis can identify more plants all over the world.
- Higher accuracy. With all the efforts we made, our AI based engine is now smarter and more accurate.
- Identification optimization. It is convenient for users to suggest a name for an unknown plant.
- New selection function. We have classified identified and unknown plants lists.
- New history browsing feature. Users can review browsing history in the setting page.

- Map Channels: Discover new plants by your side and even around the world.
- Wallpaper Recommendation: A selected picture a day, beautiful plant pleases your day.
- Ranking List: You can be the No.1 by uploading and identifying plants.
- Identifying Feature: Help PictureThis to name the unknown plants.

- Map Channels: Discover new plants by your side and even around the world.
- Wallpaper Recommendation: A selected picture a day, beautiful plant pleases your day.
- Ranking List: You can be the No.1 by uploading and identifying plants.
- Identifying Feature: Help PictureThis to name the unknown plants.

- Plant frames. You can share fancy plant pictures with your friends.
- Machine expansion. Add another 300 plant species in the database and enhance the recognition accuracy.
- Map optimization. It works smoother and less data usage.
- Halloween is coming! Join our facebook’s event and win gift cards.

- Plant frames. You can share fancy plant pictures with your friends.
- Machine expansion. Add another 300 plant species in the database and enhance the recognition accuracy.
- Map optimization. It works smoother and less data usage.
- Halloween is coming! Join our facebook’s event and win gift cards.

- Take a perfect selfie to know which flower you are.
- Now you can choose beautiful wallpaper as your own cover.
- Improve the speed of identifying plants.
- Decrease image load time to show you beautiful flowers faster.

- Take a perfect selfie to know which flower you are.
- Now you can choose beautiful wallpaper as your own cover.
- Improve the speed of identifying plants.
- Decrease image load time to show you beautiful flowers faster.

We are missing you guys so much, and you? Our team has concentrated on optimizing user experience.
-Improve accuracy rating of identification.
-Faster identifying speed.
-Faster loading speed of images.
-Some bug fixed.

PictureThis team would like to thank you all for your support that makes us become better.

New features:
- Like the beautiful pictures you love.
- Send messages to someone who loves plants just like you.
- Favorite the plants and wallpapers.

Fix:
A faster way of loading images to make the app better for you.

Summer is coming. With the newest PictureThis’s releases, we provide our users new features.
- Plant Care Feature. We provide Watering tips and watering reminder setting.
- Machine Expansion and Optimization. PictureThis can identify more species.
- Connect with Users. We hope our users can help us translate multilingual versions and provide us more plant species.
- In order to comply with the letter of GDPR law, we update our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. After accepting the policy, you can use PictureThis to identify plants!

Summer is coming. With the newest PictureThis’s releases, we provide our users new features.
- Plant Care Feature. We provide Watering tips and watering reminder setting.
- Machine Expansion and Optimization. PictureThis can identify more species.
- Connect with Users. We hope our users can help us translate multilingual versions and provide us more plant species.
- In order to comply with the letter of GDPR law, we update our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. After accepting the policy, you can use PictureThis to identify plants!

Summer is coming. With the newest PictureThis’s releases, we provide our users with new features.
- Plant Care Feature. We provide Watering tips and watering reminder setting.
- Machine Expansion and Optimization. PictureThis can identify more species.
- Connect with Users. We hope our users can help us translate multilingual versions and provide us with more plant species.

1. PictureThis can support languages other than English now, including French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, and Japanese.
2. Plant sharing template improved.
3. Machine optimized, accuracy improved.

Hey PictureThis fans, we've made BIG improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

1. More comprehensive in-app plant encyclopedia: Search and browse our database of 10000+ plants, and get inspired by interesting facts, history, value, and growing tips about them
2. Brand new user interface design for plant info and community
3. Plant identification accuracy greatly improved
4. iOS version now supports Arabic

Hey PictureThis fans, we've made BIG improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

1. More comprehensive in-app plant encyclopedia: Search and browse our database of 10000+ plants, and get inspired by interesting facts, history, value, and growing tips about them
2. Brand new user interface design for plant info and community
3. Plant identification accuracy greatly improved
4. iOS version now supports Arabic

Dear PictureThis fans, check out this special version made specially for cherry blossom (sakura) season!

1. Expanded database of sakura - identify and learn about more than 40 varieties of sakura
2. Plant identification accuracy improved
3. Bug fixes and smoother user experience

Dear PictureThis fans, check out this special version made specially for cherry blossom (sakura) season!

1. Expanded database of sakura - identify and learn about more than 40 varieties of sakura
2. Plant identification accuracy improved
3. Bug fixes and smoother user experience

Hello PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

1. More common names of plants are added. Know what your plants are called in other regions.
2. Plant identification accuracy improved.
3. Minor bug fixes and smoother user experience.

Hello PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

1. More common names of plants are added. Know what your plants are called in other regions.
2. Plant identification accuracy improved.
3. Minor bug fixes and smoother user experience.

Hello PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

1.Improved user interface design for the identification result page.
2.More common names of plants are added. See if you can find the ones you have heard of and learn what they are called by people in other areas.
3.More stunning plant theme wallpapers are added.
4.Minor bug fixes for smoother user experience.

Hello PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

1.Improved user interface design for the identification result page.
2.More common names of plants are added. See if you can find the ones you have heard of and learn what they are called by people in other areas.
3.More stunning plant theme wallpapers are added.
4.Minor bug fixes for smoother user experience.

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made BIG improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

1. New breathtaking time lapses of blossoms - get inspired and relaxed while witnessing dozens of flowers unfurling before your eyes
2. Updated search engine and database - thousands of new species added, identification accuracy and speed vastly improved!
3. Minor bug fixes for smoother user experience

1. New breathtaking time lapses of blossoms - get inspired and relaxed while witnessing dozens of flowers unfurling before your eyes
2. Updated search engine and database - thousands of new species added, identification accuracy and speed vastly improved!
3. Minor bug fixes for smoother user experience

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

-Weed ID improvement: detailed and easy-to-follow guides to identifying weeds and removing them.
-More comprehensive descriptions, values and care tips about plants.
-Fixed iPad compatibility issues
-Minor bug fixes for smoother user experience

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

-Weed ID improvement: detailed and easy-to-follow guides to identifying weeds and removing them.
-More comprehensive descriptions, values and care tips about plants.
-Fixed iPad compatibility issues
-Minor bug fixes for smoother user experience

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made a bunch of improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

- Manage your plant collection in more ways (search, sort and edit names)
- You can now turn on/off autosave photos to your phone in Settings in the app
- More comprehensive plant info and care guides
- Bug fixes for smoother user experience

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made a bunch of improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

- Manage your plant collection in more ways (search, sort and edit names)
- You can now turn on/off autosave photos to your phone in Settings in the app
- More comprehensive plant info and care guides
- Bug fixes for smoother user experience

A few minor bugs have been fixed for smoother user experience.

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made a bunch of improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:

- More comprehensive plant care information
- You can now listen to the pronunciation of botanical names
- Newly-added “name story” for plants, to learn interesting facts about the plant names.
- Inaccurately identified plants can be re-identified again.

- More comprehensive plant care information
- You can now listen to the pronunciation of botanical names
- Newly-added “name story” for plants, to learn interesting facts about the plant names.
- Inaccurately identified plants can be re-identified again.

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
- More featured gardening articles are available.
- Picture sharing has been optimized to allow more valuable and exciting plant information to be shared with your friends
- Plant care guides now cover even more species as new content is delivered regularly.
- Some minor bug fixes for smoother user experience

Dear PictureThis fans, we’ve made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
- PictureThis now supports larger text. You can also change the font size in the app to make reading easier.
- Introducing Notes, a feature that allows you to add notes to your plants.
- More comprehensive plant encyclopedia and plant care guides.
- Some minor bugs fixes for smoother user experience

Dear PictureThis fans, we’ve made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
- PictureThis now supports larger text. You can also change the font size in the app to make reading easier.
- Introducing Notes, a feature that allows you to add notes to your plants.
- More comprehensive plant encyclopedia and plant care guides.
- Some minor bugs fixes for smoother user experience

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
1. Upgraded premium services center for members.
2. Our botanical experts provide more exclusive articles for the seasons and festivals, such as "plant care tips in winter" and "how to pick Christmas trees".
3. More comprehensive plant encyclopedia and plant care guides.
4. Fixed some minor bugs to improve your experience.

Dear PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
1. Upgraded premium services center for members.
2. Our botanical experts provide more exclusive articles for the seasons and festivals, such as "plant care tips in winter" and "how to pick Christmas trees".
3. More comprehensive plant encyclopedia and plant care guides.
4. Fixed some minor bugs to improve your experience.

A few minor bugs have been fixed for smoother user experience.

Hello PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
1. Full support Dark Mode to match your system settings
2. Get alerts when your plant is identified to be poisonous or may cause allergies.
3. New "People Often Ask" section in plant details. See the common garden problems people have and find solutions easily with our step-by-step guides.
4. More comprehensive plant encyclopedia and plant care guides.
5. Fixed some minor bugs to improve your experience.

Hello PictureThis fans, we've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
1. Full support Dark Mode to match your system settings
2. Get alerts when your plant is identified to be poisonous or may cause allergies.
3. New "People Often Ask" section in plant details. See the common garden problems people have and find solutions easily with our step-by-step guides.
4. More comprehensive plant encyclopedia and plant care guides.
5. Fixed some minor bugs to improve your experience.

We've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
1. Auto diagnose plant problems
2. New "Flower of the Week" series featuring seasonal flowers that are worth checking out
3. More comprehensive plant encyclopedia and plant care guides.
4. Fixed some minor bugs to improve your experience.

We've made several improvements in this update. Try the latest version to check out:
- New feature: "Book" feature is added. You can now read books such as Attracting Birds to your Backyard and Field Guide to Trees &Wildflowers in PictureThis
- Able to add notes or name your plants in Collection
- A few minor bugs have been fixed for a smoother user experience.

Our new and improved version has two enhanced functions:

An upgraded plant database that allows you to search for information on cultivars.
An optimized and more intuitive search engine that makes search functionality smarter and more responsive.
